bio.description: A short biography of the user

createdDate.description: The timestamp at which this Profile was created in the system.  This property cannot be changed and is thus ignored by the server in request bodies

displayName.description: The human-readable name of the user, e.g. Firstname Lastname.  This property is derived from the user's security credentials and cannot be updated via REST

email.description: The user's email address.  This property is derived from the user's security credentials and cannot be updated via REST

lastLogin.description: The timestamp of the user's most recent login.  This property is managed by the server and cannot be manually updated via REST

username.description: The user's username, which must be unique within the system.  This property is derived from the user's security credentials and cannot be updated via REST

organizations.description: id references to the Organizations that this user is a member of.  In server responses, these organizations also appear with more information in the _embedded object

id.description: The opaque unique identifier assigned to this profile by the server
